snippet: Immigrant workers from across Europe tell of intimidation by guards in neo-Nazi clothing and jackboots, from a subcontractor named H.E.S.S.
abstract: Online retail giant Amazon says it is investigating claims made in a documentary that a subcontractor in Germany employed security guards with neo-Nazi ties to oversee immigrant workers.
lead_paragraph: Immigrant workers from across Europe tell of intimidation by guards in neo-Nazi clothing and jackboots, from a subcontractor named H.E.S.S.

headline.seo: Amazon to Investigate Claims of Worker Intimidation in Germany
headline.main: Amazon to Investigate Claims of Worker Intimidation at Distributor in Germany
headline.print_headline: Amazon to Investigate Claims of Worker Intimidation at Distributor in Germany
